name: KATHMANDU CASINO
shortDescription: A casino-style card game inspired by Teen Patti and 3-card poker, playable with virtual chips at competitive tables.
fullDescription:
KATHMANDU CASINO is a digital card game centered on competitive 3-card gameplay, offering a variety of virtual tables where players can bet using chips. The game features a welcoming starting bonus and realistic hand rankings, including 3 of a Kind, Flush, and Run.

Key Features:

  • Competitive Card Gameplay: Classic 3-card rules for strategic and engaging play.
  • In-Game Chips: Play with virtual chips at tables, with a welcome bonus to get started.
  • Multiplayer Tables: Compete against AI opponents in shared-pot tables for realistic casino-style experience.
